analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol:
	Contract MiningKing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#124-127)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in MiningKing.mintForwarder (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#148-188):
	External calls:
	- previousEpochCount = ERC918Interface(minedToken).epochCount() (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#155-157)
	- require(bool)(proxyMinterInterface(proxyMinter).proxyMint(nonce,challenge_digest)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#160-161)
	- require(bool)(mintForwarderInterface(proxyMinter).mintForwarder(nonce,challenge_digest,remainingProxyMintArray)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#166-167)
	- require(bool)(ERC918Interface(minedToken).epochCount() == previousEpochCount.add(1)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#173-176)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- miningKing (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#186)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter 'challenge_digest' of ERC918Interface.mint (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#83) is not in mixedCase

Parameter 'challenge_digest' of proxyMinterInterface.proxyMint (/unique_chucks/13/0x0b98f937f6edd6f66b0f0a210d3dcd8ec1063cb6.sol#101-104) is not in mixedCase
